DOC.brief_summary: We want to serach the relationship between the pain degree and stone localisation in kidney in Retrograde intrarenal surgery
DOC.brief_title: Is There Any Relation Between Pain and Stone Location in Retrograde Intrarenal Surgery?
DOC.criteria: Patients undergoing RIRS Age between 18 and 90 years Patients who have congenital urogenital abnormalities 2)Patients who have previous surgery history
